title: How soon after riot release patches do all things become available?
body: So i've always been curious but after riot release patch notes how long do we need to wait till everything in that patch is made available? Cause i've been waiting so long for cosmic yi to come out so I can buy him and feed with him but wasn't patch 7.8 already released?

replies.body: Patch 7.8 was applied to live already, yes, *however* the patch will last until the server goes down for maintenance to apply patch 7.9 (quite simply, where 7.8 ends 7.9 begins). That said, all the content (specifically new Champs, Skins and Chromas that generally aren't released with the maintenance) is usually available by the Monday (over the weekend) following the patch maintenance (there are exceptions but I don't think that will happen in this instance).
